title: Contributing to Sitebricks
html:
We love user contributions in any form. We strive to provide features that users want while maintaining our commitment to Sitebricks principles. The easiest way to contribute is to send a message to the friendly folk on our mailing list.

Alternatively, if you already have concrete source code you wish to contribute, feel free to send a pull request to Dhanji at the Sitebricks Github repository.

Happy coding!
